Pesan Tito ke Kapolri Idham: Penegakan Hukum Tak Mudah di Negara Sangat Plural
01 Nov 2019, 11:48 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tito Karnavian mengucapkan selamat bertugas kepada Kapolri Idham Azis yang telah resmi dilantik Presiden Jokowi. Tito mengingatkan soal tugas yang menanti mulai internal hingga Pilkada serentak 2020.
Selamat bertugas. Banyak pekerjaan yang harus dikerjakan oleh Pak Idham. Jadi kapolri nggak gampang, karena internal saja harus ngurusin 450 ribu orang (personel)," kata Tito di Kompleks Istana, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Selain itu, ada 34 polda, 500 lebih polres, dan 5.000 polsek yang tersebar di seluruh wilayah. Tak hanya itu, ada juga tugas pokok pemeliharaan kamtibmas sekaligus pelayanan kepada publik.
Tito juga berpesan soal penanganan kejahatan-kejahatan konvensional seperti begal hingga illegal logging. Tito mengatakan tugas yang diemban sangat kompleks.
"Penegakan hukum itu nggak gampang di tengah negara yang sangat pluralistik, dan demokrasi yang cenderung bebas. Jadi permasalahan idiologis, politis, pilkada tahun depan 270 daerah itu akan banyak sekali. Lalu permasalahan kejahatan-kejahatan konvensional seperti perampokan, begal, kekayaan negara, illegal logging, illegal fishing, masalah lingkungan. Kompleks sekali. Saya merasakan tiga tahun tiga bulan merasa cukup berat," tuturnya.

Tito's message to the National Police Chief Idham: Law Enforcement Is Not Easy in a Very Plural Country
Nov 1, 2019, 11:48 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) Tito Karnavian congratulated his duty to National Police Chief Idham Azis who had been officially inaugurated by President Jokowi. Tito reminded about the tasks that await starting internally until the simultaneous local elections in 2020.
Enjoy your duty. Much work must be done by Pak Idham. So the National Police Chief isn't easy, because internally I have to take care of 450 thousand people (personnel), "said Tito at the Palace Complex, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
In addition, there are 34 regional police, 500 more polres, and 5,000 polsek scattered throughout the region. Not only that, there are also the main tasks of maintaining Kamtibmas as well as services to the public.
Tito also gave a message about handling conventional crimes such as illegal logging. Tito said the task carried out was very complex.
"Law enforcement is not easy in the midst of a very pluralistic country, and democracy that tends to be free. So the problem of ideological, political, regional elections next year will be a lot of 270 regions. Then the problem of conventional crimes such as robbery, begal, state wealth, illegal logging, illegal fishing, environmental problems. Very complex. I feel three years and three months feel quite heavy, "he said.
